def anuund():
    t = int(raw_input())
    
    while (t > 0):
        t -= 1
        
        n = int(raw_input())
        array = map(int, raw_input().split())
        
        array.sort()
        finalArray = []
        i = 0
        j = n - 1
        
        
        while (i <= j):
            finalArray.append(str(array[i]) + " ")
            i += 1
            if (i < j):
                finalArray.append(str(array[j]) + " ")
                j -= 1
        
        print ("".join(finalArray)).strip()
    pass

anuund()
